May 18, 1895 D Jedburgh Contest
Jedburgh Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
jedburgh-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Great Britain
Allerley Well Park, Jedburgh By coincidence all the four bands selected the same piece as their own choice. It was the test piece at Kirkcaldy the previous year. Prizes: 20 guineas, 12 guineas, 8 guineas, 5 guineas Promoted by Jedforest Brass Band Committee 4 bands competed
April 14, 2012, 8:19 p.m. June 17, 2019, 7:05 p.m.
1 Galashiels Town Thomas Moore Great Britain
2 Alloa Burgh James Robinson Great Britain
3 Kirkcaldy Trades Richard Marsden Great Britain
4 Clydebank Burgh Band Richard Marsden Great Britain
